price: Mereka tidak menunggu, melainkan satu teriakan saja 1270 yang akan membinasakan mereka ketika mereka sedang bertengkar.
arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ تَأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّمُونَ
footnotes: 1270.  Maksudnya, suara tiupan sangkakala yang pertama yang menghancurkan bumi ini.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā yanẓurūna illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhiṣṣimūna
